0.name: GameGob Engine
0.description: A centralized platform for generating and managing a suite of 2D web games, driven by a single PowerShell script.
0.monetization: Free-to-Play with Ads, IAP for Ad Removal

1.name: Tic Tac Titans
1.description: Strategic tic-tac-toe where you collect and upgrade unique Titans, each with game-changing powers.

2.description: Hangman where you unlock permanent perks and recruit helper companions to improve your guessing and word-crafting skills over many games.

3.description: Rock-paper-scissors with collectible elemental wands; level up your wands and unlock new skills across runs to dominate the arena.

4.description: Explore dangerous mines, using found tools to disarm traps and find gold, unlocking permanent upgrades to delve deeper each run.

5.description: A cosmic bird on a rampage to devour the universe; grow larger with each run, unlocking new abilities to consume ever-bigger objects.

6.description: Build epic domino chains, unlocking special dominoes with unique effects to create even more spectacular runs.

7.description: The classic Snake game, but each run lets you unlock permanent power-ups that enhance your serpent's abilities.

8.description: An auto-runner where you collect power-ups and coins, unlocking new abilities and characters to reach greater distances in each run.

9.description: A fast-paced game about capturing ghosts, where you unlock new gadgets and abilities across runs to improve your ghost-busting skills.

10.description: Checkers with power-ups; each run earns you currency to permanently upgrade your checkers and unlock new board-altering abilities.

11.description: A competitive block-dropping game where you earn currency each run to unlock new attack and defense powers, creating a unique loadout.

12.description: Defend against waves of space invaders, unlocking new weapons and ship upgrades across runs to create the ultimate space defense.

13.description: Pilot a ship through an asteroid field, unlocking new ships and abilities across runs to achieve record distances and scores.

14.description: A top-down adventure where each run generates a new dungeon, and you collect persistent upgrades to become a legendary hero.

15.description: Generates the base HTML structure for a given game.

16.description: Generates JavaScript code to create a canvas element for a given game.

17.description: Generates JavaScript code to draw a grid on the canvas.

18.description: Generates JavaScript code to draw a symbol (X or O) on the canvas.

19.description: Generates JavaScript code to handle click events on the canvas.

20.description: Generates JavaScript code to check for win or draw conditions.

21.description: Generates JavaScript code to calculate and execute the opponent's move.

22.description: Defines the operational sequence for the Tic Tac Titans game.
